verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> this word <WH1697> that the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> against you, O children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, against the whole family <WH4940> which I brought up <WH5927> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,
You only have I known <WH3045> of all the families <WH4940> of the earth <WH127>: therefore I will punish <WH6485> you for all your iniquities <WH5771>. punish: Heb. visit upon
